BIO

As a highly-motivated, self-taught software developer, I have cultivated a fervent passion for problem-solving and delivering innovative solutions. This drive has allowed me to excel in the field and continuously expand my skillset, even in the absence of formal education.

As an ambitious and adaptive frontend software developer, I am passionate about exploring innovative ways to write code and enhancing my skillset. With experience in HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Git, and GitHub, I have developed efficient, maintainable, and scalable web applications while staying up-to-date with industry trends. Always eager to learn and evolve in the dynamic world of frontend development, I am dedicated to creating exceptional digital experiences that empower users and drive business growth. Joining a team of experienced developers, I look forward to contributing my unique blend of passion, adaptability, and commitment to excellence, while also expanding my skills and knowledge in the field. In summary, I am a versatile frontend developer driven by the desire to grow professionally and committed to delivering innovative, user-centric web applications.

Waiter

Though I realized that pursuing a professional career as a chef was not my calling, I continue to embrace my love for culinary arts by serving as the devoted chef for my family, creating memorable meals and experiences.
